name: I'm Isaias Lezama
aboutDescription1: Hello and welcome! My name is Isaias Lezama, and I am a passionate full-stack web developer. With expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React, Express, Firebase, and MongoDB, I have acquired a wide range of skills to build robust and dynamic web applications.
aboutDescription2: On this website, you will find a showcase of my portfolio, highlighting some of the projects I have worked on.
aboutDescription3: If you have any questions or would like to collaborate on a project, feel free to reach out to me through the provided contact information. Thank you for visiting my website, and I look forward to connecting with you soon!
